[[File:PC_E.png|80px|left|link=]][[File:PC_E.png|right|80px|link=]] A community-driven wiki focusing on [[PokéClicker|Pokéclicker]] that [[Help:Editing|anyone can edit]].
Today is {{CURRENTDAYNAME}} {{CURRENTMONTHNAME}} {{CURRENTDAY}}, {{CURRENTYEAR}} at {{CURRENTTIME}}.
The wiki currently has [[Special:Statistics|'''{{NUMBEROFARTICLES}}''']] [[Special:Allpages|articles]] since May 31, 2008.
There is a total of {{NUMBEROFACTIVEUSERS}} active users this month.
---- [[Wikia:Help:Tutorial|Wiki tutorial]]{{·}} [[:Category:Help|Help pages]]{{·}} [https://discord.gg/a6DFe4p Discord]{{·}} [[:Category:Content|Content]]{{·}} [[PokéClicker Wiki:Directory|Directory]]
[[PokéClicker Wiki:Ruleset|Ruleset and guidelines]]{{·}} [[Special:SpecialPages|Special pages]]{{·}} [[Special:Categories|Categories]]{{·}} [[Special:Preferences|Preferences]]{{·}} [[Help:FAQ|FAQ]] ----

Pokéclicker is an open source game built around the story and content of the Pokémon games. This is a idle & clicker type game which is currently in beta release phase with new content and patches getting released frequently.

Pokémon is sole property of Nintendo and we do not claim to have any ownership of the same.

---- You can start browsing this wiki by scrolling below and clicking on any of the links. == '''Maps & Navigation''' == {| class="wikitable" style="margin: auto;" ! [[Regions]] !! [[Farm]] !! '''Didn't find the page you were looking for? try looking at this list of all [[Special:Statistics|'''{{NUMBEROFARTICLES}}''']] [[Special:AllPages|pages]]''' This wiki is community managed but we do try to keep a [[To-Do list]] of what is missing or needs updating on this wiki. Please let us know on [https://discord.gg/a6DFe4p Discord] if you see anything that needs updating on a page or simply add it in the [[To-Do list]]. Thankyou.
